hero.title: Identify technologies on websites
hero.text: Find out the technology stack of any website. Create lists of websites that use certain technologies, with email addresses and phone numbers. Use our tools for lead generation, market analysis and competitor research.

lookup.title: Technology lookup
lookup.subtitle: Find out what websites are built with
lookup.text: Instantly reveal the technology stack and contact details of any website, such as ecommerce platform, content managment system or marketing automation tools.
features: Perform up to 100,000 lookups at once

lists.title: Lead lists
lists.subtitle: Create lists of websites that use certain technologies
lists.text: Find new prospects by the technologies they use. Lead lists contain websites, email addresses, phone numbers and social media profiles. Create and export custom reports for any web technology based on website traffic, location and language.
features: Organic data with traffic markers and contacts

apis.title: APIs
apis.subtitle: Programmatic access to technographic data
apis.text: The Wappalyzer APIs provide instant access to website technology stacks, contact details and social media profiles. Track your prospects' technology choices, examine large numbers of websites or enrich your own datasets with technographic insights.

alerts.title: Website alerts
alerts.subtitle: Get notified when a website's technology stack changes
alerts.text: Monitor your competitor's technology choices with alerts. Be the first to know when they move to a new CMS, ecommerce platform or any other technology.

pricing.title: Pricing
text: Sign up for free to access technology lookups, lead lists, APIs and more. Pay with a credit card, PayPal account or credit balance.
A plan grants you monthly credits at a lower price. Credits can be spent on any product.
